body: I got one  assumption about this game:) why u guys not make this game more related to it's history (or world). replies.body:
Thing is, this would seriously mess with game balance. There'd be no way for Riot to effectively manage all of that with all of the things they currently have to contend with (especially considering that they semi-regularly fall short on balancing as is).

This kind of thing would be best suited as a featured mode in the RGM queue, where it doesn't affect the standard play of the game (especially ranked/pro play).

EDIT: And I believe the word you are looking for is "Suggestion" not "Assumption".

I agree a biff of some sort would be a bad move, but I see no reason you couldn't get a little IP boost or something :P It'd be a cool little nod to the lore, and wouldn't affect balance or gameplay choices.

Or OR maybe they could have an emote (like the ones that go on your mastery key) with that region/factions sigil! I like the sound of that.

but when people playing like this, they can feeling the history of this game, every good thing is hard to balance, otherwise it is easy to done, like Yasuo, it is good for some player, it is hard to balance too. just assume, when our side pick demacia, our enemy will prefer to choose naxus, the feeling of this game is totally changed. I do agree with you, it is also suitable for featured mode =)
